translation.en: [man 1] Looking at a horse when he's standing still looks magical,
translation.it: Guardare un cavallo in piedi è già magico,

translation.en: but when he's running, you know, it's like,
translation.it: ma quando corre è come se…

translation.en: they should have wings.
There's a lot of horses I've been given, um, on this ranch
translation.it: Al ranch mi hanno lasciato molti cavalli problematici, che altri non riuscivano a gestire.

translation.en: that, uh, were problem horses that other people couldn't handle.
translation.it: molti cavalli problematici, che altri non riuscivano a gestire.

translation.en: Line up, boys!
Once you start working them
translation.it: Una volta che inizi ad addestrarli

translation.en: and you find their niche,
what they're gonna be and what they can do…
translation.it: che carattere hanno e cosa possono fare…

translation.en: Good girl.
…you know, they fit in quite well.
[man 2] No one can classify themselves as a horse master.
translation.it: Nessuno può dirsi padrone dei cavalli.

translation.en: My father can classify himself as a horse trainer,
translation.it: Mio padre però può dirsi un addestratore,

translation.en: 'cause he's trained horses to do incredible feats.
translation.it: perché ha fatto compiere loro imprese incredibili.

translation.en: -It's not just someone doing a trick. -[clicking tongue]
translation.it: Non si tratta di qualche trucchetto.

translation.en: It's like they become really good friends.
translation.it: È come se diventassero grandi amici.

translation.en: [man 1] Smile, guys. Smile.
Yay! Good!
[woman] But you lose the Robin that I married for a little while.
translation.it: Per un po' perdo mio marito Robin,

translation.en: But it's… it's worth it to see what the result is, the magic that he creates.
translation.it: ma vale la pena vedere il risultato, sa fare magie.

translation.en: [Robin] When you get a new horse and you don't know
translation.it: Quando c'è un cavallo nuovo e non conosci…

translation.en: what his history was…
sometimes it takes a little bit to get
translation.it: a volte ci vuole un po' di tempo…

translation.en: across that edge.
[Robin] Some of the… the wildest horses that you come across,
and you get them, and you see that spark in their eye, and they're wild.
translation.it: hanno una scintilla negli occhi, sono indomabili.

translation.en: You know deep down, you can see it in their eye,
translation.it: Ma te lo senti, lo vedi nei loro occhi,

translation.en: there's a better side to this horse.
[Robin] I grew up with horses always around me.
translation.it: Io sono sempre stato tra i cavalli.

translation.en: I was raised in a little country town in Australia.
translation.it: Sono cresciuto in un paese di campagna in Australia.

translation.en: I wasn't small, but I would be called the runt of the litter.
translation.it: Non ero piccolo, ma ero il più minuto della figliata.

translation.en: I didn't speak that well. I couldn't read.
translation.it: Non parlavo bene, non sapevo leggere.

translation.en: I was a loner.
I was happy with a horse.
When you can't communicate with other people,
translation.it: Quando non riesci a comunicare con gli altri…

translation.en: you're ostracized a little bit.
That's why I was pushed to my grandparents,
translation.it: Così mi mandarono dai miei nonni

translation.en: to try to change my life, which it changed my life.
translation.it: per provare a cambiare vita, e mi ha cambiato la vita.

translation.en: I looked up to my granddad, and he had a stern voice.
translation.it: Ammiravo mio nonno, aveva una voce severa.

translation.en: And, you know, he was a highly decorated war hero,
translation.it: Ammiravo mio nonno, aveva una voce severa. Era un eroe di guerra pluridecorato,

translation.en: and he'd been in the Light Horse Brigade in Australia, you know.
translation.it: era stato nella cavalleria leggera australiana.

translation.en: And that's such a… a huge honor
to fight for your country on horseback.
translation.it: combattere per il tuo Paese a cavallo.

translation.en: But… I've never seen
love in my… granddad's eyes.
We always ate at the table together.
And then he'd look straight down at his food,
and then he'd look up again and just look straight through you. That stare.
translation.it: poi alzava gli occhi e ti fissava con uno sguardo penetrante.

translation.en: Just before he passed away in hospital,
and… and he'd still give me that look.
[Robin] That's always been at the back of my mind,
you know, what my granddad had said to me, you know?
translation.it: quello che mi diceva mio nonno.

translation.en: "You'll amount to nothing."
My grandma was very soft-spoken.
When I was young, I would look at a book.
Instead of opening up and going from the top,
translation.it: e invece di aprirlo e iniziare dall'alto

translation.en: I would start from the bottom, and she said,
"Now start from this side here
and then follow it down again and again and again."
translation.it: poi scendi e rifallo tante volte".

translation.en: And I think that's what's helped me pass this on to my training.
translation.it: Credo che questo si rifletta nel mio addestramento.

translation.en: You know, it was that repetition of doing it.
She said, "Believe in what you are."
"And if you want to do it through the horses, do it."
translation.it: Se vuoi esprimerti con i cavalli, fallo.

translation.en: Just be very gentle with them,
and they will give back a lot more love to you.
translation.it: e lui ti restituirà ancora più amore".

translation.en: You know, I… I like a man who watches things going around.
translation.it: Sai, mi piacciono quelli che osservano.

translation.en: It means he'll make his mark someday.
[Robin] I would say I was about 10 or 11.
I went into this movie theater, and… I was mesmerized.
translation.it: Andai al cinema e rimasi incantato.

translation.en: You know, it was so large, the screen. It's just wide,
and… the animals running towards you.
translation.it: Lo schermo era immenso. Vedevi gli animali venirti incontro.

translation.en: And the whole attire,
translation.it: Vedevi gli animali venirti incontro. I costumi…

translation.en: I mean, the hat, the boots, and the scarf.
translation.it: Il cappello, gli stivali, il fazzoletto…

translation.en: Especially their mannerism and how they got on a horse, you know?
translation.it: E soprattutto l'atteggiamento, come salivano a cavallo.

translation.en: It's just like, "Oh, wow."
translation.it: E soprattutto l'atteggiamento, come salivano a cavallo. Uno spettacolo.

translation.en: I went back the next day.
Every time I watched a western with a horse doing something unusual,
translation.it: Quando vedevo un western con cavalli che facevano cose strane,

translation.en: you know, I'm gonna copy that and just see if I can do it better.
translation.it: io pensavo di copiarlo e farlo meglio.

translation.en: My first trick was the lay-down position,
translation.it: Il primo passo fu farli accovacciare.

translation.en: because I wasn't that big to… to get on the horse. So I had to teach him to lay down so I could get on him.
translation.it: Non ero molto alto per salirci sopra. Gli insegnai a sdraiarsi per montare.

translation.en: Good boy. Whoa.
I wanted to get into the picture business, because I wanted to train horses.
translation.it: Volevo entrare nel mondo del cinema addestrando cavalli.

translation.en: But all the lots in Hollywood got rid of all the horses,
translation.it: Ma a Hollywood non c'erano più cavalli.

translation.en: because it was just after Star Wars.
Westerns were done.
Moving 10,000 miles across the world… [chuckles] …to America,
translation.it: Avevo attraversato il mondo per andare in America.

translation.en: it felt like you just had a brick dropped right on the back of your neck.
translation.it: Fu come essere colpito in testa da un mattone.

translation.en: I'm not gonna make it.
It's over.
There was still a desire to stay here
translation.it: Ma avevo ancora il desiderio di restare qui

translation.en: and work it out.
Once I got to Wyoming,
I knew this was home.
Getting up early in the morning, and I… I think it was the first morning
translation.it: Al mattino mi alzavo presto. Credo fosse la prima mattina

translation.en: after pulling the chuck wagon in on this little lot.
translation.it: dopo aver trascinato il carro fin qui.

translation.en: And… seeing the horses right there with me,
translation.it: E… vedendo i miei cavalli lì con me,

translation.en: there was no going back.
It was my dream to train.
My, uh, third horse
was Juniper, and which… changed my life completely.
translation.it: fu Juniper. Mi ha cambiato la vita.

translation.en: When I looked in Juniper's eyes, there was a little bit of a sadness there.
translation.it: Negli occhi di Juniper vedevo un po' di tristezza.

translation.en: Even though it might have been in his past, I'd seen something bigger.
translation.it: Forse era il suo passato, ma ci vedevo qualcosa di più grande.

translation.en: That horse was so smart.
He had that gift.
Juniper had this wonderful rear.
He had great balance. Unbelievable.
translation.it: Aveva un equilibrio perfetto. Era incredibile.

translation.en: A horse like that,
it only comes once in a lifetime.
You like Robin?
Hey, do you like me?
-[whinnies] -Of course you do.
[Robin] When I got here, even though the westerns had finished,
translation.it: Quando sono arrivato, anche se non facevano più western,

translation.en: but these old cowboys still were alive,
translation.it: i vecchi cowboy non erano scomparsi.

translation.en: it was about two years later, I run into Darrell Winfield.
translation.it: Due anni dopo conobbi Darrell Winfield.

translation.en: Wow, that's the Marlboro Man. He was the real deal.
translation.it: Wow, quello della Marlboro. Era il migliore.

translation.en: Darrell said, "Robin, I've heard you've got a horse that can rear."
translation.it: Mi disse: "So che hai un cavallo che si impenna.

translation.en: "Can you put a rider on him, and can you cue him behind camera to rear?"
translation.it: Puoi farglielo fare con un fantino davanti alla telecamera?"

translation.en: I said, "Well, I've got, uh, Juniper over here."
It was definitely my first audition.
I got the part.
I got a job.
[Robin] When you get storyboards, you look at them, you go,
translation.it: Ti arriva lo storyboard, lo guardi e pensi:

translation.en: "Wow, okay, I think I can do better than that."
translation.it: "Wow, ok, penso di poter fare di meglio".

translation.en: And action!
Good.
Good boy.
I know, especially my horses, and… they all enjoy working.
translation.it: Specialmente ai miei cavalli piace molto lavorare.

translation.en: You know, they find their niche.
I think, when you get on set, you know,
you know where you started from with the horse.
translation.it: sai da dove sei partito con il cavallo.

translation.en: The building blocks that went into it.
And that's when the orchestra comes out.
translation.it: Ed è allora che suona l'orchestra.

translation.en: He's performing in front of you,
and he's performing in front of that camera.
He's showing off his art.
translation.it: Mette in mostra la sua arte.

translation.en: Good boy! Good!
Kick! Good boy!
First lesson's pretty good.
translation.it: Come prima lezione non c'è male.

translation.en: Smart horse.
Come on, young lady.
Come around.
One second on camera, when you look into it…
-[clanging] -…it's weeks and hours of training.
Come on. Come on. Come on.
Good, kids!
I use a… a whip or pointer,
translation.it: Uso un frustino o una bacchetta.

translation.en: and it's not there to, um, touch the horse.
I'd use a pointer, or I would use a lunge whip as a sound.
translation.it: Uso una bacchetta o un frustino per il suono.

translation.en: All right, here we go, guys!
It's just to guide him to go away from you…
translation.it: Serve solo a guidarli ad allontanarsi

translation.en: …or come to you.
[whistles] Come to me.
Eye contact is very important with everything.
translation.it: Il contatto visivo è molto importante.

translation.en: It's just like a human. You know when you first meet a person?
translation.it: È come una persona Sai quando incontri qualcuno?

translation.en: Good. Good. Okay, you found your mark. Pirouette.
translation.it: Bene. Ok, hai trovato il punto. Piroetta.

translation.en: Come.
You might be right-handed. I'm left-handed.
translation.it: Qualcuno è destro, io sono mancino.

translation.en: And that is exactly the same with a horse on each side of his eye.
translation.it: Con gli occhi dei cavalli è esattamente lo stesso.

translation.en: You got to train with one side first and then go to the other side.
translation.it: Va addestrato prima da un lato e poi dall'altro.

translation.en: Once you got both eyes,
then you can cue them from anywhere around the camera.
Pirouette.
And… good gal!
Bravo! Bravo!
That was beautiful, Em.
A pirouette is so graceful,
and they can hold their front feet, where she'll pivot all the way around.
translation.it: Punta le zampe davanti e gira intorno.

translation.en: And it's just… it's like going out into a waltz.
[Robin] And when you've got both eyes in sync, it's just like playing the piano,
translation.it: Quando hai addestrato entrambi gli occhi, è come suonare il piano.

translation.en: 'cause they're playing their music in front of you.
translation.it: Suonano la loro musica davanti a te.

translation.en: Imagine the power you'd feel
if you had 50 horses charging towards you.
translation.it: con cinquanta cavalli che caricano verso di te.

translation.en: Whoa! You're a big girl.
I seen this, uh, in a circus book when I was a kid.
translation.it: L'ho visto in un libro sul circo, da bambino.

translation.en: A Clydesdale standing on top of a… a teeter-totter.
translation.it: Un Clydesdale in piedi… su un'altalena. Ho sempre voluto farlo.

translation.en: And I always wanted to recreate it.
translation.it: su un'altalena. Ho sempre voluto farlo.

translation.en: I just want to get her to balance it now and just hold the weight.
translation.it: Voglio che trovi l'equilibrio e ci resti.

translation.en: Steady. Nope.
Steady.
You have to gradually let them
feel,
smell you…
and then you've got that touch with them.
translation.it: e poi entri in sintonia con loro.

translation.en: I'll look back on some of the magical stuff that I put together with horses.
translation.it: Alcune magie che sono riuscito a fare con i cavalli…

translation.en: You know, if it's not on film, it's like it never happened.
translation.it: Se non sono filmate, è come se non siano successo.

translation.en: Look at that balance! That's balance!
Yes!
[Robin] A paragon pioneer
is a person that's living in the present but… believes in the past as well.
translation.it: è una persona che vive nel presente ma crede anche nel passato.

translation.en: Sometimes you feel like you've been there before.
translation.it: A volte ti sembra di esserci già stato.

translation.en: Welcome! Welcome!
Little bit of history here, guys.
[woman] Robin is very passionate about recreating the old Wild West.
translation.it: Una grande passione di Robin è ricreare il far west.

translation.en: And we're all proud of it, because we all participate in some way.
translation.it: Ne siamo tutti fieri, tutti diamo il nostro contributo.

translation.en: [man] The cowboy dream is dying off,
translation.it: Il mito del cowboy sta svanendo,

translation.en: but for my father, no, he's definitely a full-blown cowboy.
translation.it: ma non per mio padre, lui è un vero cowboy.

translation.en: [Robin] It makes me feel like when I first got to America.
translation.it: Mi fa sentire come quando sono arrivato in America.

translation.en: Just want to keep it alive.
Welcome, boys! Welcome!
♪ Paint your wagon Come along ♪
translation.it: Dipingi il carro, vieni con me

translation.en: ♪ Gotta dream, boy Gotta song ♪
translation.it: Ho un sogno e canto una canzone

translation.en: We're going home, baby!
[Robin] My horses, when I… talk about them…
I say, "The kids are out together," because they are kids.
translation.it: spesso dico: "I bambini sono usciti". Sono dei bambini.

translation.en: They're my children, even though I've got Patrick.
translation.it: Sono come dei figli, anche se ho Patrick.

translation.en: When I first got Juniper,
that horse taught me so much
translation.it: Quel cavallo mi ha insegnato tanto

translation.en: of being patient and being humble and excited.
He would do better than I had ever thought an animal could ever do.
translation.it: Superava sempre le mie aspettative, per un animale.

translation.en: And you'd only have to show him once, and bang, he got it.
translation.it: Gli facevi vedere una cosa una volta e capiva al volo.

translation.en: Good boy, Jun.
He built me, and he built this ranch.
translation.it: Io e il ranch siamo quello che siamo grazie a lui.

translation.en: Juniper was getting old. He was in his thirties.
The young man that I had here signaled to me.
translation.it: Il ragazzo che lavorava qui mi avvertì.

translation.en: He said, "You know, you'd better come in. I think Juniper is really, really sick."
translation.it: "È meglio che venga a vedere. Juniper sta molto male."

translation.en: And he must have hung on till I got home.
translation.it: Ha resistito finché non sono tornato.

translation.en: And I got there and put him in my arms and just… knelt down there with him,
translation.it: Sono arrivato lì, l'ho preso tra le braccia, mi sono inginocchiato e ha nitrito un'ultima volta.

translation.en: and, you know, he gave that last little whinny
translation.it: mi sono inginocchiato e ha nitrito un'ultima volta.

translation.en: and then was gone.
[boy on TV] How'd you know when he was gonna draw? [man on TV] By watching his eyes.
translation.it: - Come facevi a saperlo? - Guardandolo negli occhi.

translation.en: -Remember that. -[boy on TV] I will.
Come on, guys. Line up. Come on. School time.
translation.it: Forza, in fila! Forza, è ora della lezione.

translation.en: Mrs. Parker loves to give smiles.
-Mrs. Parker. -[clicking]
Good girl.
Good girl.
Once the horse gets the spark,
translation.it: Se un cavallo ha la scintilla,

translation.en: I'm the flint.
And all of a sudden,
the animal just comes alive, and he's got it.
translation.it: l'animale prende vita e fa magie.

translation.en: [Robin] As much love as you can put into them,
they're gonna give it back to you.
But if you can stand there and hold that,
translation.it: E se puoi… coglierlo ed assaporarlo…

translation.en: …it's a world.
